import './Dashboard.css' export default function DashBoard( {rollRoom, setRollRoom, setDiceInput, setMapModal, setRoomNumber, roomInput, diceInput, hideDice, showDice} ) { let backgroundColor = 'green' if (rollRoom === 'On') { backgroundColor = 'green' } else { backgroundColor = 'rgb(185, 0, 0)' } function toggleRollRoom() { if (rollRoom === 'On') { setRollRoom('Off') } else { setRollRoom('On') } } return (
